ValidationRule.description: Requires Safe Harbor Match Determination Period value when Safe Harbor Match is selected and Imp is marked "Complete"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISPICKVAL( Implementation_Status__c , "Completed")) && ( (ISPICKVAL ( ( Safe_Harbor__c ), "Basic Match (100% of 1st 3%+50% of next 2%)")) || (ISPICKVAL ( ( Safe_Harbor__c ), "4%")) || (ISPICKVAL ( ( Safe_Harbor__c ), "5%")) || (ISPICKVAL ( ( Safe_Harbor__c ), "6%")) || (ISPICKVAL ( ( Safe_Harbor__c ), "Auto-Enroll Basic Match (100% up to 1%, 50% up to 6%)"))) && (ISPICKVAL ( Safe_Harbor_Match_Determination_Period__c , ""))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please verify the Safe Harbor Match Determination Period before completing the Implementation
